description: A small four-person paddle boat based on the Going Merry, created by Franky as a tribute to the Straw Hats' former ship. It features a steam engine, paddle wheels, and a sheep figurehead reminiscent of the original Going Merry. Stored in Soldier Dock Channel 2 of the Thousand Sunny.
creator: Franky

keyMoments.description: Franky unveils the Mini Merry II from Soldier Dock Channel 2, and Nami, Usopp, and Chopper take it on its maiden voyage to explore Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the vessel that will be used throughout the series for island exploration and as a lifeboat.

specialProperties: Designed to honor the memory of the Going Merry
Compact storage in Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System
